destroy.chemistry.acid: 酸是能够将{氢离子, destroy:proton}贡献给其他物质的物质。它们与{碱, destroy:base}反应。
destroy.chemistry.addition: 加成反应是将一个基团加到一个{分子, destroy:molecule}上的反应。
destroy.chemistry.addition_elimination: 加成-消去反应是将一个基团从{分子, destroy:molecule}中移除，然后再加入另一个基团——这不同于{取代反应, destroy:substitution}，两者同时发生。
destroy.chemistry.addition_polymer: 加成{聚合反应, destroy:polymer}并不{缩聚, destroy:condensation_polymer}产生副产物，且往往通过{自由基, destroy:radical}{机理, destroy:mechanism}进行。
destroy.chemistry.aldehyde: 醛是[destroy:carbonyl]的一种类型，其中羰基碳与至少一个氢成{键, destroy:bond}，区别于{酮, destroy:ketone}。
destroy.chemistry.alkane: 烷烃是一组只由碳和氢通过单{键, destroy:bond}组成的{分子, destroy:molecule}
destroy.chemistry.aqua_regia: “aqua regia”，拉丁文含义为“皇家水”。王水是[destroy:nitric_acid]和[destroy:hydrochloric_acid]的混合物，可以{溶解, destroy:solution}{贵, destroy:inert}金属，如金。
destroy.chemistry.atom: 原子是由带{正电, destroy:charge}的{原子核, destroy:nucleus}被带{负电, destroy:charge}的{电子, destroy:electron}包围组成的微小粒子。
destroy.chemistry.base: 碱是能够接受来自其他物质的{氢离子, destroy:proton}的物质。它们与{酸, destroy:acid}反应。
destroy.chemistry.bond: 两个{原子, destroy:atom}通过共享一对{电子, destroy:electron}成键。原子的带{正电, destroy:charge}的{原子核, destroy:nucleus}被带{负电, destroy:charge}的{电子, destroy:electron}所吸引，需要大量的能量才能被拉开。
destroy.chemistry.carboxylation: 羰基化反应是与[destroy:carbon_dioxide]的反应。它与{脱羧反应, destroy:decarboxylation}相反。
destroy.chemistry.charge: 电荷与质量一样，是一种固有属性。物体可以带正电或带负电，带异种电荷的物体会相互吸引，而带同种电荷的物体会相互排斥。
destroy.chemistry.catalyst: 催化剂是一种改变化学反应速率的物质，本身不被消耗。
destroy.chemistry.condensation_polymer: 缩聚是脱去一个小{分子, destroy:molecule}（如[destroy:water]）形成{聚合物, destroy:polymer}的反应，如DNA和尼龙。
destroy.chemistry.cycle: 一个环状{分子, destroy:molecule}在其结构中至少有一个环。
destroy.chemistry.decarboxylation: 脱羧反应是从一个{分子, destroy:molecule}中[destroy:carbon_dioxide]被{消去, destroy:elimination}的反应。它与{羰基化反应, destroy:carboxylation}相反。
destroy.chemistry.degree: 级数是指与一个原子{成键, destroy:bond}的碳{原子, destroy:atom}的个数。例如，与另外两个碳原子成键的碳原子被称为“仲碳原子” (又称二级碳)。伯仲叔季分别对应一至四级。
destroy.chemistry.diene: 一个二烯体{分子, destroy:molecule}至少包含两个被一个{单键, destroy:bond}分开的{双键, destroy:double_bond}。
destroy.chemistry.dienophile: 亲二烯体指的是被{二烯体, destroy:diene}吸引的{分子, destroy:molecule}。一些[destroy:alkene]和炔烃是亲二烯体。
destroy.chemistry.disproportionation: 歧化是指同一物质在一个反应中既发生{氧化反应, destroy:oxidation} 又是{还原反应, destroy:reduction}的{氧化还原反应, destroy:redox}。
destroy.chemistry.double_bond: 如果两个{原子, destroy:atom}间形成双{键, destroy:bond}的，它们之间共享两对{电子, destroy:electron}，而不是一对。
destroy.chemistry.electron: 电子是低质量的、带{负电, destroy:charge}的{亚原子, destroy:subatomic}粒子。
destroy.chemistry.electrophile: 亲电体是能够接受一个{电子, destroy:electron}对的物质。它们与{亲核体, destroy:nucleophile}相对。
destroy.chemistry.elimination: 消去反应是指从一个{分子, destroy:molecule}中消去一个基团的反应。
destroy.chemistry.endothermic: 吸热反应吸收热量。其与{放热反应, destroy:exothermic}相对。
destroy.chemistry.exothermic: 放热反应产生热量。其与{吸热反应, destroy:endothermic}相对。
destroy.chemistry.halide: 卤化物是{卤素, destroy:halogen}的{离子, destroy:ion}。
destroy.chemistry.halogen: 卤素是一组元素，包括氟、[destroy:chlorine]、溴和[destroy:iodine]。
destroy.chemistry.hydrogenation: 氢化反应是一种与[destroy:hydrogen]发生的{还原反应, destroy:reduction}的反应。
destroy.chemistry.hygroscopic: 吸湿性物质有吸收[destroy:water]的极大倾向
destroy.chemistry.ion: 离子为{带电的, destroy:charge}{原子, destroy:atom}或{分子, destroy:molecule}。
destroy.chemistry.ketone: 酮是含[destroy:carbonyl]的有机物之一，其中羰基碳与其他两个碳（而非氢）{成键, destroy:bond}，区别于{醛, destroy:aldehyde}。
destroy.chemistry.mechanism: 机理告诉你一个反应如何发生——{电子, destroy:electron}如何转移、中间产物有哪些。
destroy.chemistry.mixed_xylenes: “混合二甲苯”是指[destroy:metaxylene]、[destroy:orthoxylene]、[destroy:paraxylene]和[destroy:ethylbenzene]的混合物。
destroy.chemistry.molecule: 分子包含多个{成键, destroy:bond}的{原子, destroy:atom}。
destroy.chemistry.nucleophile: 亲核体是一种能够提供{电子, destroy:electron}对的物质。它们被吸引到{带正电, destroy:charge}的区域（{原子核, destroy:nucleus}带有正电，亲核体因此命名)。它们与{亲电子体, destroy:electrophile}相反。
destroy.chemistry.neutron: 中子是存在于{原子, destroy:atom}{核, destroy:nucleus}中的中性(不带{电荷, destroy:charge})的粒子。
destroy.chemistry.nucleus: 在每个{原子, destroy:atom}的中心是一个原子核，由{质子, destroy:proton}和{中子, destroy:neutron}组成。
destroy.chemistry.oxidation: 一个{原子, destroy:atom}失去{电子, destroy:electron}的反应就是氧化，通常为与[destroy:oxygen]反应。氧化与{还原, destroy:reduction}相反。
destroy.chemistry.proton: 质子是存在于{原子核, destroy:nucleus}中的带{正电, destroy:charge}的{亚原子, destroy:subatomic}粒子。一个{原子, destroy:atom}中质子的个数决定了它是什么元素。
destroy.chemistry.polarity: 一个极性{分子, destroy:molecule}有一个带{正电, destroy:charge}的一端和一个带{负电, destroy:charge}的一端。
destroy.chemistry.polymer: 聚合物的英语“polymer”中，“poly”是希腊语，意思为“许多”，因为聚合物是包含许多重复的“单体”{分子, destroy:molecule} 。塑料均为聚合物，包括{加成, destroy:addition_polymer}和{缩合, destroy:condensation_polymer}聚合物。
destroy.chemistry.precipitation: 沉淀指溶质离开{溶液, destroy:solution}。
destroy.chemistry.radical: 大多数物质都含有成对{电子, destroy:electron}，然而自由基不同，其具有未成对的电子，通常具有很强的反应活性。
destroy.chemistry.radical_initiator: 自由基引发剂是产生{自由基, destroy:radical}并引发{聚合反应, destroy:polymer}的物质。
destroy.chemistry.redox: A redox reaction is one in which one species is {oxidized, destroy:oxidation} and another {reduced, destroy:reduction}.
destroy.chemistry.reduction: 一个{原子, destroy:atom}得到{电子, destroy:electron}的反应就是还原。还原与{氧化, destroy:oxidation}相反。
destroy.chemistry.salt: Salts are compounds composing {positive, destroy:charge} and {negative, destroy:charge} {ions, destroy:ion}.
destroy.chemistry.sequestration: 碳捕集指对温室气体的捕获，将其以固体或液体的形式储存。
destroy.chemistry.solution: 溶液包括溶剂以及溶解于其中的溶质。
destroy.chemistry.standard: Standard conditions are defined as all species being in their standard states, at 1 bar of pressure, at a constant temperature.
destroy.chemistry.standard_half_cell_pot: {Half reactions, destroy:half_reaction} cannot occur on their own. They must be paired with another. The {half reaction, destroy:half_reaction} with the higher {standard, destroy:standard} half-cell potential occurs as shown here (as a {reduction, destroy:reduction}), and the other in reverse (as an {oxidation, destroy:oxidation}).
destroy.chemistry.substitution: 取代反应是指一个{分子, destroy:molecule}上的一个基团被另一个基团迅速取代的反应。
destroy.chemistry.subatomic: “亚原子”是指比{原子, destroy:atom}更小。
destroy.chemistry.syngas: 合成气是由[destroy:carbon_dioxide]和[destroy:hydrogen]组成的混合物。
destroy.chemistry.thermal_decomposition: 热分解，或称热解，是物质受热时的自发分解。
destroy.chemistry.transalkylation: 烷基转移是{烷基, destroy:alkane}在[destroy:benzene]环之间的转移。
destroy.chemistry.ultraviolet_catalysed_: 这个反应由来自太阳、黑光灯或类似的光源方块的紫外线来{催化, destroy:catalyst}。对反应釜思索来了解更多。
destroy.chemistry.unknown_definition: 未知定义——请报告此漏洞。
destroy.display_source.centrifuge.dense_: 输出的重质混合物组分
destroy.display_source.centrifuge.light_: 输出的轻质混合物组分
destroy.explosive_property.brisance.desc: The additional spread of launched shots
destroy.explosive_property.energy.descri: The higher, the stronger the explosion
The provided propulsion, stress and recoil
destroy.explosive_property.oxygen_balanc: The further from zero, the weaker the explosion
The higher from zero, the greater the propulsion
destroy.explosive_property.temperature.d: The hotter, the greater the stress on the cannon
destroy.ponder.tag.chemistry.description: 用于处理化学成分混合物的元件
destroy.ponder.tag.vat_side_blocks.descr: 用于构筑反应釜的方块
destroy.ponder.aging_barrel.text_1: 与工作盆一样，陈酿桶中可以装入流体与物品
destroy.ponder.aging_barrel.text_2: 经过一段时间，陈酿桶会产生一种新的流体
destroy.ponder.aging_barrel.text_3: 旅店老板以陈酿桶为工作方块，并在学徒等级售卖酵母
destroy.ponder.arc_furnace.text_1: Place a suitable electrode Block (Carbon Fiber, unless changed by an add-on or modpack) between a Basin and Dynamo.
destroy.ponder.arc_furnace.text_4: Arc Furnaces can do Blasting Recipes quickly.
destroy.ponder.arc_furnace.text_5: Some Recipes specifically require an Arc Furnace.
destroy.ponder.blowpipe.text_2: Dunk the Blowpipe in a Basin of the right Fluid...
destroy.ponder.blowpipe.text_4: Once done, hit against a block to dislodge the product.
destroy.ponder.blowpipe.text_5: Shift-click to change the selected Recipe.
destroy.ponder.blowpipe.automation.text_: Once a Recipe is selected, Blowpipes can be filled by Spout.
They can also be dunked directly by Deployers.
Static Deployers will place Blowpipes parallel to their Shafts.
To place in the opposite direction, reverse the rotation of the Deployer.
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap.text_1: 蒸馏塔由竖直堆叠的泡罩构成
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap.text_2: 蒸馏塔能自动蒸馏底端泡罩（即再沸器）中的流体
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap.text_3: 流体的沸点越高，其在塔中上升得越高
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap.text_4: 有些蒸馏配方需要在再沸器下方的热源
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap.mixtures.text_: 蒸馏塔能蒸馏任何混合物
通过工程师眼镜，你能看到再沸器的温度
烈焰人燃烧室可以提高之
沸点高于再沸器温度的成分会混合在再沸器中
沸点低于室温的气体会混合于顶端泡罩中
其他成分会根据其沸点形成不同的馏分
泡罩越多，馏分种类越多
如此，你便能分离沸点不过高或过低的成分
使用显示链接器轻松了解馏分的组成
destroy.ponder.centrifuge.text_1: 离心机会缓慢分离从上方注入的流体
destroy.ponder.centrifuge.text_2: 由侧面提取密度更大的流体
destroy.ponder.centrifuge.text_3: 由底面提取密度更小的流体
destroy.ponder.centrifuge.text_4: 离心机不主动输出流体——需用动力泵提取
destroy.ponder.centrifuge.text_5: 使用润滑剂来提高处理速率
destroy.ponder.centrifuge.mixture.header: 使用离心机分离混合物
destroy.ponder.centrifuge.mixture.text_1: 离心机可用于将混合物依据密度分离为其组分
destroy.ponder.centrifuge.mixture.text_2: 此时离心机总是会产生两份等量的产品
destroy.ponder.centrifuge.mixture.text_3: 各组分由密度差异分离
destroy.ponder.colorimeter.text_1: Colorimeters can read the concentration of certain species if placed facing a Vat.
destroy.ponder.colorimeter.text_2: The Block they are touching must be transparent.
destroy.ponder.colorimeter.text_3: They give an interpolated Redstone signal based on the concentration they observe.
destroy.ponder.cooler.header: 使用流浪者制冷室制冷
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_1: 对着流浪者鼠标右击使用空的烈焰人燃烧室来捕获它
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_2: 这样你便获得了可用于冷却工作盆的打工仔
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_3: 不同于烈焰人燃烧室，流浪者制冷室依赖由底部泵入的混合物运转
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_4: 该混合物必须包含有“制冷剂”标签的成分
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_6: 高浓度的制冷剂能延长制冷时间
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_7: 一些配方中要用到工作中的流浪者制冷室
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_8: Using a Creative Blaze Cake can turn the Refrigerstrayer off, or on indefinitely.
destroy.ponder.dynamo.redstone.header: 使用直流发电机产生红石信号
destroy.ponder.dynamo.redstone.text_1: 直流发电机会向正下方的方块输出红石信号
destroy.ponder.dynamo.redstone.text_2: 信号强度与直流发电机的转速相关
destroy.ponder.dynamo.charging.header: 使用直流发电机充能物品
destroy.ponder.dynamo.charging.text_1: 直流发电机能加工置于其下方的物品
destroy.ponder.dynamo.charging.text_2: 或以掉落物的形式，或置于直流发电机下方的置物台上
destroy.ponder.dynamo.electrolysis.heade: 使用直流发电机电解流体
destroy.ponder.dynamo.electrolysis.text_: 放置在工作盆上方第二格处的直流发电机可执行电解配方
destroy.ponder.explosives.dyeing.text_1: Explosive Mix Blocks can be dyed any color by crafting with Dyes.
destroy.ponder.explosives.dyeing.text_2: Dyes can also be applied directly to the block.
destroy.ponder.explosives.dyeing.text_3: Clipboards will copy the color, at no extra Dye cost.
destroy.ponder.explosives.filling.text_1: Explosive Mix Blocks can be filled with explosives by crafting them together.
destroy.ponder.explosives.filling.text_2: They can also be filled in-world by all normal methods.
destroy.ponder.explosives.filling.text_3: They can also be filled in the GUI, which will let you see the Explosive Properties of the explosive.
destroy.ponder.explosives.filling.text_4: Clipboards will attempt to copy Explosive Mix Blocks' contents by taking items from your inventory.
destroy.ponder.explosives.exploding.head: The effects of Explosive Mix explosions
destroy.ponder.explosives.exploding.text: The items an Explosive Mix Block is filled with and its Explosive Properties affects what its explosion does.
For example, it could Silk Touch blocks, or evaporate fluids.
To get some special drops, the  Brisance must be high enough to fulfill the 'Obliteration' condition.
destroy.ponder.explosives.naming.text_1: Mixed Explosives, like all items, can be named with an Anvil.
destroy.ponder.explosives.naming.text_2: The first few letters of the name will show on the sides of the block.
destroy.ponder.explosives.naming.text_4: This only works with Destroy's 'Mixed Explosives', not the Mixed Charge or Mixed Shell included if you have 'Create: Big Cannons' installed.
destroy.ponder.extrusion_die.header: 使用挤压模具加工方块
destroy.ponder.extrusion_die.text_1: 一些方块被挤过挤压模具时会发生转化
destroy.ponder.mechanical_sieve.text_1: Loose Items on top of a powered Mechanical Sieve will split into parts.
destroy.ponder.mechanical_sieve.text_2: You may find that you get exactly what you want the first time you do some recipes. Call it beginners' luck...
destroy.ponder.periodic_table.text_1: Here is every element available as a periodic table block.
destroy.ponder.periodic_table.text_2: Other modpacks or add-ons might add more.
destroy.ponder.periodic_table.text_3: Assembling every element block shown here like this will earn you a reward.
destroy.ponder.phytomining.header: 通过植物采矿提取矿物
destroy.ponder.phytomining.text_1: 类似骨粉使用，超富集肥料可使特定的作物变异
destroy.ponder.phytomining.text_2: 一些变异能够提取耕地下方第一格处放置的矿石
destroy.ponder.pollution.tanks.text_1: Open pipes will release fluids, including Mixtures, into the atmosphere.
destroy.ponder.pollution.tanks.text_2: Destroying any blocks containing fluids will do the same.
destroy.ponder.pollution.tanks.text_3: This can increase  Smog,  Greenhouse Gas concentration,  Rain Acidity and  Ozone Depletion in the world.
destroy.ponder.pollution.basins_and_vats: Basins cannot hold any gas, and any they produce will be released, polluting the world.
Wrenching the top of a Vat adds a vent, which will release any gases contained in the vent and replace them with air.
The vent can be opened and closed with Redstone.
destroy.ponder.pollution.smog.text_1: As the level of  Smog increases in the world, everything will slowly turn browner.
destroy.ponder.pollution.crop_growth_fai: The effect of pollution on plant growth
As levels of  Smog,  Greenhouse Gases and  Rain Acidity increase, there is an increasing chance that crops will fail to grow.
This also applies when using Bonemeal on crops.
Hyperaccumulating Fertilizer works regardless of pollution levels.
destroy.ponder.pollution.fishing_failure: The effect of pollution on fishing
As the level of  Smog increases in the world, fishing will yield fewer fish and more junk.
destroy.ponder.pollution.breeding_failur: The effect of pollution on animal breeding
As the level of  Smog increases in the world, there is an increasing chance for animals to fail to breed.
destroy.ponder.pollution.villager_price_: The effect of pollution on Villagers' prices
As the level  Smog increases in the world, Villagers get annoyed by the ugliness and raise their prices for all Players.
destroy.ponder.pollution.cancer.header: The danger of destroying the ozone layer
destroy.ponder.pollution.cancer.text_1: As the level of  Ozone Depletion increases, more UV light penetrates the atmosphere.
destroy.ponder.pollution.cancer.text_2: This increases the risk of skin cancer when outside in hot biomes.
destroy.ponder.pollution.cancer.text_3: This has no effect in Destroy, but you should always wear sunscreen!
destroy.ponder.pollution.acid_rain.text_: As the level of  Rain Acidity increases in the world, rain becomes greener.
There is also an increasing risk that exposed organics will be killed.
destroy.ponder.pollution.room_temperatur: As levels of  Greenhouse Gases and  Ozone Depletion increase, outdoor temperature rises.
This affects the chemicals which will be collected at the tops of Distillation Towers.
It also affects the rate of heat transfer in and out of Vats.
destroy.ponder.pollution.reduction.text_: All types of pollution slowly decrease over time.
Levels of  Smog,  Greenhouse Gases and  Rain Acidity can be decreased further by planting trees.
However, just like real life, this is just a patchwork solution and the only real way to fix our effect on the environment is to cut down on emissions.
destroy.ponder.pollution.lightning.text_: Whenever lightning strikes in the world, some ozone is generated, decreasing the level of  Ozone Depletion.
destroy.ponder.pollution.catalytic_conve: Reducing harmful emissions with Catalytic Converters
When placed on the end of pipes, Catalytic Converters reduce the amount of pollution released by fluids.
destroy.ponder.pumpjack.text_1: 在存在原油储备的区块中，接入动力的抽油泵会缓慢提取原油
destroy.ponder.pumpjack.text_2: 抽油泵不主动泵出原油——需要使用动力泵来输出原油
destroy.ponder.redstone_programmer.text_: Click on a Redstone Link with a Redstone Programmer to add that channel to the Programmer.
With JEI installed, you can also drag in items manually in the GUI.
Shift-click to place the Programmer in the world.
While placed or in a Player's inventory, Programmers can broadcast sequences of wireless Redstone signals.
destroy.ponder.seismometer.header: Locating Crude Void Oil with the Seismometer
destroy.ponder.seismometer.text_1: Add a Seismometer to a filled Map in a Cartography Table to turn it into a Seismograph.
destroy.ponder.seismometer.text_2: The Map must not be empty.
destroy.ponder.seismometer.text_4: If you are holding a Seismometer and Seismograph covering that area, and there is a nearby explosion, information will be added to the Seismograph.
destroy.ponder.seismometer.text_5: Any explosion will do (even a Creeper), but Touch Powder can be made early on and isn't destructive.
destroy.ponder.seismometer.text_6: Intepreting the Seismograph can help you work out where Oil might be.
destroy.ponder.seismograph.text_1: When a Seismometer activates, it will mark on any Seismographs in your inventory whether the chunk you were in is seismically active (a check) or not (a cross).
destroy.ponder.seismograph.text_2: It also tells you the number of seismically active chunks in the row and column on the Seismograph.
destroy.ponder.seismograph.text_3: You can mark chunks you think are or are not seismically active by clicking.
destroy.ponder.seismograph.text_4: The number of colored pixels on the side tells you how many seismically active chunks are in a row in that row, but does not tell you where they are.
destroy.ponder.seismograph.text_5: (This type of puzzle is called a nonogram).
destroy.ponder.seismograph.text_7: If there are multiple numbers, then there are multiple groups in that row.
destroy.ponder.seismograph.text_8: They are in order. For example, if the column says "2 1", then there are two contiguous seismically active chunks...
destroy.ponder.seismograph.text_10: If there are multiple numbers, the contiguous sets never touch.
destroy.ponder.seismograph.text_13: If you collect enough data you can work out which chunks are seismically active.
destroy.ponder.seismograph.text_14: But it will take a bit of lateral thinking!
destroy.ponder.seismograph.text_15: Chunks containing Oil are always seismically active, and so are the four chunks touching them.
destroy.ponder.seismograph.text_16: This means that Oil can only be found in the center of "plusses".
destroy.ponder.seismograph.text_17: While seismically active chunks are somewhat random, if you can form a "plus" there will usually be Oil at the center of it.
destroy.ponder.seismograph.text_20: So drill in the center of big blobs of seismically active chunks!
destroy.ponder.tree_tap.text_1: When given rotational power, the Tapper can extract fluid from trees.
destroy.ponder.tree_tap.text_2: The fluid can be pumped out the back.
destroy.ponder.trypolithography_intro.te: The creation of Circuit Boards requires punching Circuit Masks with the correct pattern.
Keypunches will punch holes in Circuit Masks on Depots and Belts underneath.
Click the Keypunch to configure which hole it punches.
A single Mask can only be punched by up to three different Keypunches before being too contaminated.
destroy.ponder.trypolithography_rotating: Getting around (and around) the contamination limit
Circuit Masks can only be punched by up to three Keypunches, but usually require more than three holes.
One way to get around this is rotating Masks to use the same Keypunch more than once.
The additional hole will not count as a new contaminant.
Any relative rotation between the Keypunch and Mask will work.
destroy.ponder.trypolithography_flipping: When launched by a Weighted Ejector, Circuit Masks flip over.
This is another way to allow the same Keypunch to punch multiple holes, avoiding contamination.
destroy.ponder.vat.fluids.header: Getting Fluids in and out of Vats
destroy.ponder.vat.fluids.text_1: Fluids can be pumped in and out of Vats on any face.
destroy.ponder.vat.fluids.text_2: Edges and corners do allow access to the Vat.
destroy.ponder.vat.fluids.text_3: Only Mixtures - and some Fluids which convert to Mixtures - can go in a Vat.
destroy.ponder.vat.fluids.text_4: Mixtures can only really go in Vats and Basins - not usually tanks from other mods.
destroy.ponder.vat.fluids.text_6: Vats store both a liquid phase and a gas phase.
destroy.ponder.vat.fluids.text_7: The liquid level inside the Vat will determine whether a pipe pulls out liquid or gas.
destroy.ponder.vat.fluids.text_8: Mixtures cannot be filtered with Smart Pipes (or any Filter).
destroy.ponder.vat.items.header: Getting Items in and out of Vats
destroy.ponder.vat.items.text_1: Items can be pulled in and out of Vats with Funnels on any face.
destroy.ponder.vat.items.text_2: Again, the edges and corners do not count.
destroy.ponder.reactions.text_1: When Mixtures are left in a Vat or mixed in a Basin, all possible Reactions occur.
destroy.ponder.reactions.text_2: Most of the possible Reactions Destroy simulates are listed in JEI.
destroy.ponder.reactions.text_3: If you are not familiar with chemistry, an upcoming major update to Destroy will teach you.
destroy.ponder.vat.temperature.text_1: Wrench the side of a Vat to add a thermometer, which will read the Vat's internal temperature.
destroy.ponder.vat.temperature.text_2: The internal temperature of Vats tries to equilibriate to match the temperature outside.
destroy.ponder.vat.temperature.text_3: The rate at which this occurs is goverened by Fourier's Law, and depends on the conductivity of the blocks used to build the Vat.
destroy.ponder.vat.temperature.text_4: Lit Blaze Burners supply a small constant amount of heating power, which results in a higher equilibrium temperature.
destroy.ponder.vat.temperature.text_5: The heating power can be increased with more Blaze Burners, and by superheating them.
destroy.ponder.vat.temperature.text_6: Refrigerstraytors withdraw a constant amount of heating power from the Vat.
destroy.ponder.vat.pressure.text_1: Wrench the side of a Vat twice to add a barometer.
destroy.ponder.vat.pressure.text_2: This shows the pressure exerted outwards by the gas inside the Vat.
destroy.ponder.vat.pressure.text_3: The amount of pressure increases as more gas is added...
destroy.ponder.vat.pressure.text_5: ...and as the space available to the gas is reduced by adding more liquid.
destroy.ponder.vat.pressure.text_6: The opposites are also all true.
destroy.ponder.vat.pressure.text_7: The maximum pressure difference a Vat can withstand is determined by the weakest Block in the Vat's structure.
destroy.ponder.vat.pressure.text_8: If the pressure from the inside of the Vat is too different to the air pressure from outside, the Vat will explode or implode.
destroy.ponder.vat.reading.text_1: Wrench the side of a Vat to add a thermometer.
destroy.ponder.vat.reading.text_2: Wrench twice to add a barometer.
destroy.ponder.vat.reading.text_3: If connected to Redstone, thermometers and barometers give an output signal.
destroy.ponder.vat.reading.text_4: The strength of this signal is interpolated between two values, which can be configured by clicking.
destroy.ponder.vat.reading.text_5: A value below the minimum value will not give a signal.
destroy.ponder.vat.reading.text_6: A value above the maximum value will give a full strength signal.
destroy.ponder.vat.reading.text_7: Any values inbetween will give an interpolated signal.
destroy.ponder.vat.reading.text_8: Threshold switches read the liquid fill level proportional to the Vat's total capacity.
destroy.ponder.vat.reading.text_9: Vats can also be connected to Display Links, and will display their contents.
destroy.ponder.vat.uv.header: 使用黑光灯为反应釜提供光照
destroy.ponder.vat.uv.text_1: 一些反应需要紫外线来催化
destroy.ponder.vat.uv.text_2: 通过顶部的透明方块，反应釜能接受紫外线，无论昼夜
destroy.ponder.vat.uv.text_3: As the level of  Ozone Depletion increases, more UV power reaches the Vat in this way.
destroy.ponder.vat.uv.text_4: 放置在反应釜透明侧壁旁的黑光灯能提供更多紫外线
destroy.generic_reaction.alcohol_dehydra: The {anhydrous, destroy:anhydrous} de{hydration, destroy:hydrolysis} of an [destroy:alcohol] to make an [destroy:alkene].
destroy.generic_reaction.alcohol_oxidati: 将非{叔醇, destroy:degree}于{酸, destroy:acid}中{氧化, destroy:oxidation}为[destroy:carbonyl]。在低温下进行避免进一步{氧化, destroy:oxidation}
destroy.generic_reaction.aldehyde_oxidat: 将{醛, destroy:aldehyde}于{酸, destroy:acid}中{氧化, destroy:oxidation}为[destroy:carboxylic_acid]
destroy.generic_reaction.alkene_chlorina: The {electrophilic, destroy:electrophile} {addition, destroy:addition} of [destroy:chlorine] to an [destroy:alkene].
destroy.generic_reaction.alkene_chlorohy: The {electrophilic, destroy:electrophile} {addition, destroy:addition} of [destroy:hypochlorous_acid] to an [destroy:alkene]. The alcohol group gets added to the higher {degree, destroy:degree} carbon.
destroy.generic_reaction.alkene_hydrolys: [destroy:alkene]{水解, destroy:hydrolysis}生成[destroy:alcohol]。醇基结合于{级数, destroy:degree}更高的碳原子上
destroy.generic_reaction.alkene_hydrobor: The {electrophilic, destroy:electrophile} {addition, destroy:addition} of [destroy:diborane] to three [destroy:alkene]s. The borane is added to the higher {degree, destroy:degree} carbon.
destroy.generic_reaction.alkene_borane_h: The {electrophilic, destroy:electrophile} {addition, destroy:addition} of [destroy:diborane] to three [destroy:alkene]s. This usually occurs three times.
destroy.generic_reaction.alkene_hydrochl: The {electrophilic, destroy:electrophile} {addition, destroy:addition} of [destroy:hydrochloric_acid] to an [destroy:alkene]. The chlorine {atom, destroy:atom} gets added to the higher {degree, destroy:degree} carbon.
destroy.generic_reaction.alkene_hydroiod: The {electrophilic, destroy:electrophile} {addition, destroy:addition} of [destroy:hydrogen_iodide] to an [destroy:alkene]. The iodine {atom, destroy:atom} gets added to the higher {degree, destroy:degree} carbon.
destroy.generic_reaction.alkene_hydrogen: 镍{催化, destroy:catalyst}下[destroy:alkene]的{氢化反应, destroy:hydrogenation}.
destroy.generic_reaction.alkene_iodinati: The {electrophilic, destroy:electrophile} {addition, destroy:addition} of [destroy:iodine] to an [destroy:alkene].
destroy.generic_reaction.amine_phosgenat: The reaction of an [destroy:amine] with [destroy:phosgene] to form an [destroy:isocyanate], in {anhydrous conditions, destroy:anhydrous}.
destroy.generic_reaction.borane_oxidatio: The insertion of an oxygen {atom, destroy:atom} over the carbon-boron {bond, destroy:bond}. Easily {hydrolyzed, destroy:hydrolysis} to an [destroy:alcohol].
destroy.generic_reaction.borate_esterifi: The reversible joining of an [destroy:organic_boric_acid] (or just [destroy:boric_acid]) and an [destroy:alcohol]. Continually remove [destroy:water] to favor the products.
destroy.generic_reaction.carboxylic_acid: [destroy:sulfuric_acid]{催化, destroy:catalyst}下[destroy:alcohol]与[destroy:carboxylic_acid]反应生成[destroy:ester]。在{无水, destroy:anhydrous}条件下进行。
将[destroy:carboxylic_acid]{还原, destroy:reduction}为{醛, destroy:aldehyde}。在低温下进行以避免进一步{还原, destroy:reduction}。
destroy.generic_reaction.cyanamide_addit: The {nucleophilic, destroy:nucleophile} {addition, destroy:addition} of an [destroy:amine] to [destroy:cyanamide] to make a guanidine.
destroy.generic_reaction.halide_amine_su: 非叔胺上的氢原子与有机{卤化, destroy:halide}物（不只是氯，任何卤化物）发生的{亲核, destroy:nucleophile}{取代反应, destroy:substitution}
destroy.generic_reaction.halide_ammonia_: 有机{卤, destroy:halide}（不只是氯）化物与胺基的{亲核, destroy:nucleophile}{取代反应, destroy:substitution}
destroy.generic_reaction.halide_cyanide_: 有机{卤, destroy:halide}（不只是氯）化物与氰基的{亲核, destroy:nucleophile}{取代反应, destroy:substitution}
destroy.generic_reaction.halide_hydroxid: 有机{卤, destroy:halide}（不只是氯）化物与羟基的{亲核, destroy:nucleophile}{取代反应, destroy:substitution}
destroy.generic_reaction.isocyanate_hydr: The {hydrolysis, destroy:hydrolysis} of an [destroy:isocyanate] into an [destroy:amine], releasing [destroy:carbon_dioxide].
destroy.generic_reaction.nitrile_hydroge: 镍{催化, destroy:catalyst}下将[destroy:nitrile]{氢化, destroy:hydrogenation}为[destroy:amine]
destroy.generic_reaction.nitro_hydrogena: The {hydrogenation, destroy:hydrogenation} of a [destroy:nitro] compound into an [destroy:amine].
destroy.generic_reaction.wolff_kishner_r: The {reduction, destroy:reduction} of a [destroy:carbonyl] to an {alkane, destroy:alkane}.
destroy.reaction.abs_copolymerization.de: [destroy:acrylonitrile]、[destroy:butadiene] 与[destroy:styrene]的{自由基, destroy:radical}{加成共聚, destroy:addition_polymer}
destroy.reaction.acetylene_trimerization: The combination of three [destroy:acetylene] {molecules, destroy:molecule} into [destroy:benzene].
destroy.reaction.aibn_synthesis.descript: 现实中合成{聚合引发剂, destroy:radical_initiator}[destroy:aibn]的两步反应
destroy.reaction.andrussow_process.descr: 高温条件下铂{催化, destroy:catalyst}的生产[destroy:hydrogen_cyanide]的方法
destroy.reaction.baby_blue_precipitation: {离子, destroy:ion}的增加提高了溶液的{极性, destroy:polarity}，使得[destroy:methyl_salicylate]{沉淀, destroy:precipitation}
destroy.reaction.basic_diels_alder_react: 狄尔斯-阿尔德反应为{二烯, destroy:diene}与{亲二烯体, destroy:dienophile}间发生的{环合反应, destroy:cycle}
destroy.reaction.borax_precipitation.des: The {precipitation, destroy:precipitation} of Borax from a {basic, destroy:base} {solution, destroy:solution}.
destroy.reaction.boric_acid_neutralizati: In {basic, destroy:base} {solutions, destroy:solution}, [destroy:boric_acid] converts to [destroy:tetrahydroxyborate] {ions, destroy:ion}.
destroy.reaction.brown_schlesinger_proce: A method for the production of sodium [destroy:borohydride].
destroy.reaction.carbide_hydrolysis.desc: The {hydrolysis, destroy:hydrolysis} of [destroy:calcium_ion] Carbide to produce [destroy:acetylene].
destroy.reaction.carbon_tetrachloride_fl: [destroy:carbon_tetrachloride]上的氯被氟{取代, destroy:substitution}产生各种含氟产品
destroy.reaction.cellulose_nitration.des: 一种纤维素与[destroy:nitric_acid]及[destroy:sulfuric_acid]反应生产硝化纤维素的方法
destroy.reaction.chlorine_haloform_react: 略带{酸性, destroy:acid}的{酮羰基, destroy:ketone}在不断氯化后发生{亲核, destroy:nucleophile}{取代反应, destroy:substitution}产生羧酸盐
destroy.reaction.chlorine_solvation.desc: 紫外线催化下[destroy:chlorine]在[destroy:water]中的溶解平衡
destroy.reaction.chloroform_fluorination: 一种生产制冷剂及特氟龙前体[destroy:chlorodifluoromethane]的方法
destroy.reaction.chromate_conversion.des: The interconversion of [destroy:chromate] and [destroy:dichromate] ions. In more {acidic, destroy:acid} solutions, the [destroy:dichromate] dominates.
destroy.reaction.chromium_dissolution.de: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of chromium in {acid, destroy:acid}.
destroy.reaction.chromium_ore_dissolutio: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of chromium ore in {acid, destroy:acid} allowing for ore tripling.
destroy.reaction.cisplatin_synthesis.des: 一种生产化疗药物[destroy:cisplatin]的方法
destroy.reaction.cordite_precipitation.d: 爆炸物线状无烟火药的生产
destroy.reaction.copper_dissolution.desc: 铜在{酸, destroy:acid}中{溶解, destroy:solution}
用{酸, destroy:acid}{溶解, destroy:solution}铜矿来实现矿物的三倍增产
destroy.reaction.cumene_process.descript: 通过{自由基, destroy:radical}{机理, destroy:mechanism}，由[destroy:benzene]与[destroy:propene]{氧化, destroy:oxidation}产生[destroy:phenol]与[destroy:acetone]
destroy.reaction.cyclohexene_oxidative_c: 尚无化学家成功近距离观察到断裂反应，人们对该反应仍知之甚少。
destroy.reaction.cyanamide_ion_hydrolysi: The {hydrolysis, destroy:hydrolysis} of the [destroy:cyanamide_ion] {ion, destroy:ion} to produce [destroy:cyanamide].
destroy.reaction.dinitrotoluene_nitratio: A method for the production of [destroy:tnt]. Best to start with [destroy:toluene] and do all nitrations at once.
destroy.reaction.ethylbenzene_transalkyl: [destroy:ethylbenzene]通过烷基转移作用产生{混合二甲苯, destroy:mixed_xylenes}
destroy.reaction.fluorite_dissolution.de: 氟石在{酸, destroy:acid}中的{溶解, destroy:solution}
destroy.reaction.gold_dissolution.descri: 金在{王水, destroy:aqua_regia}中{溶解, destroy:solution}。有趣的是，你需要24根金胡萝卜来生产24K金
destroy.reaction.haber_process.descripti: 亦称哈伯法，不过弗里茨·哈伯是个执迷于化学武器的极端民族主义的德国人。
在氢氧化钠中[destroy:chlorine]发生{歧化反应, destroy:disproportionation}
destroy.reaction.iron_dissolution.descri: 铁在{酸, destroy:acid}中的{溶解, destroy:solution}
destroy.reaction.iron_ore_dissolution.de: 用{酸, destroy:acid}{溶解, destroy:solution}铁矿来实现矿物的三倍增产
destroy.reaction.isoprene_polymerization: The {polymerization, destroy:polymer} of [destroy:isoprene] into natural rubber.
destroy.reaction.kelp_dissolution.descri: 使用[destroy:ethanol]{溶解, destroy:solution}[destroy:iodine]以将其从海带中提取出来
destroy.reaction.lead_dissolution.descri: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of lead in {acid, destroy:acid}.
destroy.reaction.lead_ore_dissolution.de: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of lead ore in {acid, destroy:acid} allowing for ore tripling.
destroy.reaction.mercury_fulmination.des: 一种古老的生产初发炸药雷酸汞的方法
destroy.reaction.metaxylene_transalkylat: [destroy:metaxylene]的{烷基转移, destroy:transalkylation}产生{混合二甲苯, destroy:mixed_xylenes}
destroy.reaction.methanol_synthesis.desc: 由{合成气, destroy:syngas}生产[destroy:methanol]，在{无氧, destroy:anaerobic}条件下进行以避免二氧化碳的产生
destroy.reaction.nhn_synthesis.descripti: 一种合成硝酸肼镍的方法
destroy.reaction.nickel_dissolution.desc: 镍在{酸, destroy:acid}中的{溶解, destroy:solution}
用{酸, destroy:acid}{溶解, destroy:solution}镍矿来实现矿物的三倍增产
destroy.reaction.nitronium_formation.des: [destroy:nitronium]在“硝化酸”中产生，是一种能参与生成许多爆炸物的{亲电试剂, destroy:electrophile}
destroy.reaction.nylon_polymerisation.de: 生产尼龙-6,6的{缩聚反应, destroy:polymer}
destroy.reaction.oleum_formation.descrip: The reversible formation of [destroy:oleum] in highly concentrated solutions of [destroy:sulfuric_acid].
destroy.reaction.oleum_hydration.descrip: The rapid {hydration, destroy:hydrolysis} of [destroy:oleum] which is responsible for [destroy:sulfuric_acid]'s {hygroscopy, destroy:hygroscopic}.
destroy.reaction.oleum_formation.descrip: 在高浓度[destroy:sulfuric_acid]中生产[destroy:oleum]的可逆反应
destroy.reaction.oleum_hydration.descrip: [destroy:oleum]迅速{水解, destroy:hydrolysis}。[destroy:sulfuric_acid]{吸湿性, destroy:hygroscopic}的原因。
